title: John Moulder
text: John Hardie Moulder (29 September 1881 – 13 October 1933) was an English <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er who played <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class cricket</a> for <a href="Surrey%20County%20Cricket%20Club">Surrey</a>, <a href="London%20County%20Cricket%20Club">London County</a> and <a href="Transvaal%20cricket%20team">Transvaal</a> between 1902 and 1913. He also played <a href="Southern%20Football%20League">Southern League</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> for <a href="Brentford%20F.C.">Brentford</a>.
